product_name: Sugoi RS Bib Bike Shorts - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Up your ride stats. Fly down the road in the men's iconic and award-winning RS Bib Bike Shorts from Sugoi. Ergonomic 10-panel nylon/spandex fit with comfort mesh bib top. Nylon/spandex fabric wicks away moisture and dries fast. Gel chamois offers all-day comfort; seam has been eliminated underneath to reduce bulk. Comfort waistband and flat seams. Clean-finish signature elastic leg grippers keep the Sugoi RS Bib Shorts properly positioned. Closeout.
short_description: Up your ride stats. Fly down the road in the men's iconic and award-winning RS Bib Bike Shorts from Sugoi.
